actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to reinstate the tax treatment with respect to annuity contracts with reserves based on a segregated asset account as they existed prior to issuance of Revenue Ruling 77-85.

summary.text: Reverses Revenue Ruling 77-85 in order to restore the tax treatment formerly extended policy holders receiving dividends and interest on custodial account annuity contracts and the insurance companies maintaining the assets.

titles.title: A bill to reinstate the tax treatment with respect to annuity contracts with reserves based on a segregated asset account as they existed prior to issuance of Revenue Ruling 77-85.
